tetris.pieces

Interface Piece

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ImmutablePiece
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractPiece, IPiece, JPiece, LPiece, OPiece, SPiece, TPiece, ZPiece

    public interface Piece
extends ImmutablePiece
    An interface for Tetris pieces that includes more functionality than the basic rotation/movement/x/y commands.
    Version:
    October 2012
    Author:
    Daniel M. Zimmerman

      The number of blocks in a piece.
